description:
Midge and the others take Ellen back to the Stork after she loses her home, and she is finally convinced to join them in their journey to Earth after listening to Midge tell her more about the planet. However, as long as the Stork is not moving the bugs are stuck, so Midge comes up with a plan with Ellen`s help to fix the ship. Barely escaping from the frogs once again, Midge and Ellen retrieve the badly needed part and hurry back to the Stork, but after being thwarted the frogs switch their focus and go after Marbo and Doc.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Immovable Stork / Enemy Approaching the Supply Ship
Ugikanu Stork / Hokyuusen ni Semaru Teki
動かぬストーク / 補給船に迫る敵
